name: Journey's End (itch) (RagMu)
description:
GDS213 Brief 1 - Art Jam

Journey's End is a short prototype developed to evoke an emotional response from players. Take in the surroundings, explore, and enjoy!

If you've played it, and want to leave feedback, you can do so here!

Thanks for playing!

By Harry Kalogirou

Controls

A and D/left and right arrow keys - move

Spacebar - jump

Escape - exit fullscreen

Hero Knight 2D Character Pack by Luiz Melo

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/hero-knight-167779

Pixel 2D Castle Tileset by Szadi Art

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/tiles/pixel-2d-castl...
